price: They said, “We have given you glad tidings in truth, so do not be of those who despair[25].”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ
footnotes: [25] Abraham (عليه السلام) might have shown signs of doubt at believing such news.
